description: Every creamy spoonful of these delicious peach jelly and vanilla bean panna cotta cups will take you to dessert heaven.
name: Peach Jelly & Vanilla Bean Panna Cotta Cups Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 small peaches, halved, destoned, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk coconut milk, sugar and vanilla paste in a large jug. Sprinkle 1 1/2 tbs gelatine over a 1/4 cup boiling water. Whisk until dissolved. Stir gelatine mixture into milk mixture.
Place glasses, on a tilt, in 6 holes of a 1/3cup muffin pan. Pour coconut mixture among glasses. Carefully place in fridge. Chill for 2 hours or until set.
Combine boiling water and cordial in a large jug. Sprinkle remaining gelatine over 1/4 cup boiling water. Whisk until dissolved. Stir gelatine mixture into cordial mixture. Pour cordial into glasses.
Arrange peaches in cordial mixture. Chill for 2 hours or until set. Serve topped with blueberries.
